body.name: DweIke Modern Area Rugs for Bedroom Living Room, 4x6 ft Grey Thickened Memory-Foam Indoor Carpets, Minimalist Style Carpet Suitable for Boys Girls and Adults with Super Soft Touch, Washable, Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 55 mins
features: 【New Material Design】DweIke minimalist modern indoor carpet is made of soft wool coral fleece, upgraded rug has the advantages of of being skin friendly, No-shedding, and super soft to the touch

【No-shedding Top】The surface of the rug is designed with a short wool coral fleece, which is firmly embedded in the sponge layer. You can lie on it with any clothes on, and there will no fluff sticking to your clothes

【Thickened & Non-Slip】There is a thick and fast rebound memory sponge interlayer in the middle. Anti-slip latex particles are attached on the back, so it is very suitable for use on the floor, marble, tile and so on

【Modern Home Decor】Our solid color coral velvet rug fits the modern minimalist decoration style helping you create a simple atmospheric home environment. This carpet is suitable for bedroom, living room, dining room and study room

【Warm Tips for Rugs】In order to prevent dust and transportation, the rug is compressed in a vacuum sealed bag. If you feel flat and wrinkled when out of the bag, please wash and dry in washer/drier. Or use robot vacuum over it for awhile, it will quickly become fluffy and de-wrinkle. Then you will get a beautiful rug
body.description: DweIke latest indoor rug - Premium soft wool coral fleece 1. Coral fleece material is very soft, non-irritating, especially suitable for people with sensitive skin 2. The strong adhesion between the surface fluff and the sponge intermediate layer makes it not shed 3. Quick-rebound memory sponge show the thickness of the carpet 4. Short fleece makes carpets easy to care for. Using a vacuum cleaner can easily remove debris and dust from the surface Non-slip botton rug: 1.The bottom of the rectangular rug is covered with many high-density non-slip points 2.Non-slip points help increase friction with the floor and prevent sliding 3.It is very suitable for use on the floor, marble, tile and so on Size selection suggestions: 2 x 6 ft area rug is suitable for bedside 3 x 5 ft area rug is suitable for your bedside, nursery or children's room 4 x 6 ft area rug is suitable for your playroom, or beside sofa and chair 5 x 8 and 6 x 9 ft area rug is suitable for your living room, bedroom or large dining room Warm ips for the rug: 1. Considering of the transport and dust protection requirements of the rug, we use vacuum packing 2. The rug pack with a vacuum bag, the thickness will recover within two days, please don't worry 3. If you find some smell of the product when receiving it, it's a normal phenomenon caused by warehouse storage, just please expose it to the air for some time 4. Please wash the carpets according to the instructions of the washing 5. Due to the different lighting effects of the monitor and camera, the image may be slightly different from the actual color of the product 6. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug! It's great quality and I love the underside as much as the carpet side. The underside has a nice non-skid backing.I will definitely purchase more from this company.I will say, when it came it was in a small box and when I took it out it was in a bag that had all the air sucked out and it was small. I thought there's no way it's going to open to a huge rug without creases but amazingly, it did. It was kind of cool watching it come to life. Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would NOT suggest this in a million light years.
reviews.reviewText: This product I purchased in a larger size so of course the price was higher. I spent the $80 on a fleece blanket pretty much. I think that’s so ridiculous. Listen to the other reviewers as well when they say the value and quality is poor. Honestly though $80 is cheap compared to other area rugs right? I’m glad I got a different one that actually suits my wants and needs for maybe $40 more which was totally worth it. There may be some pros to this item but I didn’t even check them out or notice any right away. The item came and I was shocked by how small for a padded rug, well that’s because there is HARDLY and padding at all. Non slip where because it literally fleece on my hardwood floor just sliding around. It’s so flimsy and cheap I think the material would fall apart in a washer honestly. So don’t suggest that. And it smelled slightly like chemicals which wouldn’t have even been a con for me if the whole item wasn’t a con in itself. It’s think like a blanket I mean my blanket is probably actually thicker than the rug to be honest which is sad. Maybe if it was a decent rug made well and thinner sure. But it has nothing substantial about it I can find and is back in a box to be returned. Just save yourself time and please buy something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So the rug is not the color I ordered but it still works. The material is very soft hence my son is sleeping on the floor. As far as memory foam they could have thrown that out the window it's not. It's actually very thin but it's so soft! Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comes in good packaging, true to size
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I liked the packaging as it was compressed when it came in and unfolded nicely, It says that it will get thicker in 48hrs, the video shows is 3hrs after laying it flat. It’s a good product and I definitely recommend for anyone looking for area rugs in the house. It looks easy to clean and pick up as it isn’t very heavy. It’s perfect for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, nice color, not the most durable
reviews.reviewText: Super duper soft. My cats love it. Easy enough to throw in the washing machine. Don't expect it to last years... But a nice addition to our cold floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: It was exactly what I needed for my daughter's doll house area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rug reminded me more of a blanket than a rug. It's light weight and the backing is really thin with some texture that I assume is supposed to help with grip. If you put a piece of furniture on it, it may be non-slip, but alone it will most definitely slide around. It arrived vacuum sealed, about the size of a bath towel and I purchased the largest one offered 6x9 feet. I purchased the dark green and it is NOT even close to a match. The rug I received isn’t a bad color, but simply, not a match to what is shown here. The rug is VERY soft though. I can’t imagine you could really vacuum this rug with a standup vacuum given how lightweight it is. Ultimately, I returned it because it’s not really a rug at all and I was bothered by that and concerned about the longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars serves me as grass since itd easy to vaccum
reviews.reviewText: Next best for Kenya to show the lions
